goal_descEN: Reduce inequality within and among countries
target_descEN: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
indicator_descEN: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
seriesDescription: Countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, by policy domain (1 = Requires further progress; 2 = Partially meets; 3 = Meets; 4 = Fully meets)
sources: United Nation Inquiry among Governments on Population and Development (the âInquiryâ), available at https://esa.un.org/PopPolicy/Inquiry.aspx. The Inquiry was sent to 197 countries, including all 193 Member States, two Observer States (the Holy See and the State of Palestine) and two non-member States (Cook Islands and Niue) of the United Nations.

sources: United Nation Inquiry among Governments on Population and Development (the âInquiryâ), available at https://esa.un.org/PopPolicy/Inquiry.aspx. seriesDescription: Countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, by policy domain (1 = Requires further progress; 2 = Partially meets; 3 = Meets; 4 = Fully meets)

seriesDescription: Countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, by policy domain (1 = Requires further progress; 2 = Partially meets; 3 = Meets; 4 = Fully meets)
sources: United Nation Inquiry among Governments on Population and Development (the âInquiryâ), available at https://esa.un.org/PopPolicy/Inquiry.aspx. indicator_descEN: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
seriesDescription: Countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, by policy domain (1 = Requires further progress; 2 = Partially meets; 3 = Meets; 4 = Fully meets)
policyDomains_desc: Domain 6. Safe, orderly and regular migration
footnotes: Item non-response for domain 6 of SDG indicator 10.7.2 is 10 per cent or more.
sources: United Nation Inquiry among Governments on Population and Development (the âInquiryâ), available at https://esa.un.org/PopPolicy/Inquiry.aspx. The Inquiry was sent to 197 countries, including all 193 Member States, two Observer States (the Holy See and the State of Palestine) and two non-member States (Cook Islands and Niue) of the United Nations.
